headline.main: PEACE FEELERS' DENIED BY BERLIN; Spokesman, Answering Speech by Churchill, Says No Bid Will Be Made to Britain

lead_paragraph: BERLIN, Nov. 11 -- British Prime Minister Winston Churchill's statement regarding alleged German peace feelers provoked a vigorous denial from the Foreign Office spokesman, who told the foreign press in Berlin, "There have not been and will never be any German peace feelers in this war."
